Feature Engineering¶

The process to convert raw data to features, there are 3 types of data: - Numerical - Categorical - Ordinal

Missing Value Imputation¶

Numeric - 0 - -999 - Mean - Median

Catergorical - Mode - Others

Outliers Detection¶

  • visualized by scatter plot

  • log transformation

  • binning

Duplicate Entries Removal¶

same records with different target variable

Feature Scaling¶

  • Standardization > [0, 1000]

  • Normalization > [0, 1] or [-1, 1]

Feature Transformation¶

  • Rounding

  • Log Transformation

  • Binarization

  • Binning

  • Dummy coding

Feature Construction¶

Features Combination¶

Non-linear

Feature Extraction¶

dimensionality reduction。

  • Principal Component Analysis (PCA)

  • Latent Dirichlet Allocation (LDA)

  • Latent Semantic Analysis (LSA)
